app.title: CreArt - AI Image Generator
app.description:
Delve into the realm of creativity with CreArt, the ultimate AI Image Generator that transforms your text into stunning pictures and captivating AI Art. Discover a world where imagination comes to life with our powerful tools.

Experience the fun of a true Playground AI and the precision of a top-tier AI Generator.

✨ Discover CreArt

► What is CreArt?
CreArt is an innovative AI Art Generator that turns your written text into vibrant, unique visuals in seconds. Our AI Image Generator is meticulously designed to ignite your creativity and bring your ideas to life. Trained on a vast dataset and leveraging techniques similar to popular tools like Midjourney, Stable Diffusion, Dall-e 2 and Jasper Art, it’s like having a personal artist at your fingertips, ready to produce AI Generated Images on demand. With additional capabilities from our AI Picture Generator, CreArt stands out as a trusted AI Generator and a complete Playground AI.

► How does it work?
Simply input your text and select a style. Our advanced system, featuring our AI Image Creator and AI Photo Generator, interprets your description to create a unique AI Image, delivering stunning Image AI quality. Whether you need an AI Picture or a detailed AI Photos, CreArt’s process is as simple as letting your words serve as the canvas. Discover the magic of AI Picture Generator as your creations evolve with creative flair.

► What styles can I choose from?
CreArt empowers you with over 50 artistic styles, from Anime and Realistic to Pencil, Watercolor, Psychedelic, and more. The diversity of styles ensures that every creation, be it a classic Picture AI or a modern masterpiece, is uniquely yours.

► Why should I choose CreArt?
CreArt is a powerful AI Photo Generator that transforms your ideas into art without requiring any design skills. Its intuitive interface and versatility make it the ideal Photo Generator for everything from mobile wallpapers to social media posts. With support for multiple aspect ratios and over 15 languages, including English, CreArt is accessible to creators worldwide. Embrace the full potential of AI Art and Playground AI with CreArt as your go-to A I Generator.

► A New Perspective on Creativity
Our combined AI Image Generator and AI Photo Generator capabilities allow you to explore new artistic horizons. Mix and match styles to create your own unique aesthetic, from charming illustrations to bold AI Generated Images that capture your vision.

🎨 Create Your Masterpiece

CreArt isn’t just another art tool—it’s your personal artwork maker where your creativity is in control. Your text + your style = your artwork. Experience the revolution with our AI Digital Art Generator - the ultimate AI Image Generator, to create AI Pictures. Discover CreArt today and let your imagination soar. The future of art is here.

Terms of Use: https://waitos.github.io/creart/terms
Privacy Policy: https://waitos.github.io/creart/privacy

app.summary: AI Photo Generator - Create AI Art, AI Picture & AI Generated Images instantly!

reviews.text: Lots of style options available in the free version. I'm having so much fun I don't even notice the ads. It's generating decent images and when I get a prompt I like I just keep regenerating it getting more cool stuff. The perfect way for photo hoarders to add hundreds of pictures to their phone. And it's nice to have an option to give feedback on good and bad images
reviews.replyText: Thank you for the great review! Thrilled you love the app. Your support inspires us to keep improving :)

reviews.text: Does an excellent job of following prompt instructions and, depending on how well it was trained on a subject, produces quite usable images. The watercolor effects are a bit lacking, but adding "watercolor style" to the prompt helps. It's better than the famous ones at rendering hands and feet. For the price, it's well worth the investment for my publishing business.
reviews.replyText: Thank you for the great review! Thrilled you love the app. Your support inspires us to keep improving :)

reviews.text: The Ai prompts are so accurate it's terrifying! I really enjoy how many modes there are for the free people and finally an AI generator that doesn't have an add pop up every other second! this is my go-too app for references and creativity. also a beautiful way to use storage space up on my phone. I don't mind at all. I'll probably edit this comment if I find something I don't really like, but other than some of the generated mistakes, I am in love with this app. would recommend.
reviews.replyText: Thank you for your amazing feedback! We’re thrilled the app is your go-to for creativity and references. If you have any suggestions or find anything to improve, feel free to share. Thanks for recommending us! :)

reviews.text: I actually bought the full version because I use it everyday. Sometimes it's not very intuitive and why does it blur pictures for premium users? My gf tried making a picture of her with fox ears and fairy wings. It blurred it out. Saying it goes against their content terms. Didn't ask for nudes. Just fantasy characters for DND. If I have premium that shouldn't be an issue.
reviews.replyText: Thank you for your feedback. We have measures in place to ensure a safe application for users and we are continuously improving to provide the best possible experience. We appreciate your understanding and support.

reviews.text: I generated several images of varied styles and themes and I'm surprised that it was capable of delivering absolute perfection . an ad per image is fair given you have experience in generating content. LLM also helps a lot. great job devs . very impressive. my images look like actual arts that were auctioned. the only issue is the very limited words I can use,even with premium.
reviews.replyText: Thank you for your wonderful review! We appreciate your suggestions and are glad to hear you’re enjoying the app. Your support inspires us to keep improving :)

reviews.text: I love the app most of the time but the ads are getting to me. I wouldn't mind watching a thirty second add every time instead of a seemingly random timed add, usually 60 seconds, but sometimes five. I'd prefer a consistent thirty second ad over the inconsistency. I know it's to get you to actually pay for it but it's kind of having the opposite effect. When it was always 30 seconds I actually used it a lot more, now I only use it maybe a couple times a month, at best.
reviews.replyText: Thanks for your feedback! We understand that ad timing can impact the experience, and we appreciate your perspective. Just so you know, we don’t have control over the exact duration of the ads. If you’d like an ad-free experience, the premium version is always an option. We’ll take your comments into account as we continue improving. 😊

reviews.text: Ok, it's been about a month and a half now since I left the below review. The app still does what it says. So far, it does what it says. 👍🏾😁 Update, I've used this app for a couple of weeks and I really am enjoying what I can create with it. I am learning more about how to write the proper prompts to give me the specific Graphics I desire. The app itself is very user-friendly. I gave her the A+ and recommend that if you are into creating Graphics this is one of the best AI apps you can use.
reviews.replyText: Thank you for the great review! Thrilled you love the app. Your support inspires us to keep improving :)

reviews.text: Excellent initial experience! Wow! Just downloaded the CreArt app. Entered first simple text prompt, to generally describe my desired image's concept & key elements (for a CD project's cover art). And, in a few seconds, got a beautiful image that EXACTLY met my intent & needs! Amazing - very impressive! Plan to explore further, but/and this brief initial experience has definitely been 100% excellent! EDIT: Quick update: *Many long ads! *Saved images have CreArt Logo embedded in corner.
reviews.replyText: Thanks for your fantastic review! We're thrilled to hear that CreArt met your expectations right away. Regarding the ads and logo, we aim to balance functionality with support for our services. We appreciate your understanding and are glad you're enjoying the app!

reviews.text: Amazing app, so much so I will be going to premium, but the free version offers so much it's just one of my favorite generators to use and the only one I know I want to go premium with. Okay I need to add a little update, I just went Premium and I LOVE the additional features, so happy I went Premium love it. But again if you don't go Premium there is still plenty to choose from on the free version. I'm a really happy customer here.
reviews.replyText: Thank you for the great review! Thrilled you love the app. Your support inspires us to keep improving :)

reviews.text: Very good for a free AI art generator. You get to use the generator as many times as you want without it telling you that you ran out of free uses (there are ads every time you use it, but I didn't mind). I got some really cool results in the end. Sometimes it gets confused and doesn't retain specific details in your prompt but that can be fixed once the technology gets better. Would recommend
reviews.replyText: Thank you for the positive review and feedback! We're thrilled you enjoyed CreArt and obtained cool results. We're always working to improve and appreciate your recommendation. Happy creating!

app.developerLegalAddress: CALLE SAN NICOLAS, 14 - 1 D, 48991 GETXO, Spain
app.contentRatingDescription: Violence, Blood, Suggestive Themes, Partial Nudity, Drug Reference
app.AIReview:
CreArt - AI Image Generator Review

Overview

CreArt, an AI image generator available for free download on mobile devices, aims to democratize artistic creation by translating textual prompts into visually stunning images. With over 2.2 million installs and a 4.34-star rating based on 78,103 user reviews, the app has garnered considerable popularity within the art & design category. The core functionality revolves around utilizing artificial intelligence to generate original artwork from user-provided descriptions – essentially turning words into pictures. This review will delve into all aspects of CreArt, evaluating its features, usability, and overall value proposition for aspiring artists and casual users alike.

Key Features

CreArt’s feature set is built around a straightforward, accessible AI image generation process. The primary feature, as the app title suggests, is the “AI Photo Generator” which allows users to input text prompts and instantly receive generated images. Beyond this core function, several key features enhance the creative experience:

  • Text-to-Image Generation: The central engine, enabling users to describe desired images in natural language.
  • Style Presets: A selection of pre-defined art styles (e.g., “Impressionism,” “Cyberpunk,” “Fantasy”) that influence the generated image's aesthetic. These presets provide a quick starting point for experimentation.
  • Resolution Options: Users can choose between different resolution outputs, impacting both image quality and file size. Higher resolutions naturally require more processing power.
  • Seed Control (Limited): While not fully developed like some dedicated AI art generators, CreArt offers a rudimentary "seed" control – allowing users to tweak the initial generation parameters for slightly different variations of an image. This is represented by a slider and provides limited control over the output.
  • Image History: The app saves a history of generated images, enabling users to revisit previous creations and build upon them.
  • Community Sharing (Future Feature - Currently Under Development): The developers have announced plans for a community sharing feature where users can share their creations and inspire others – however, this is currently in development.

Strengths

CreArt’s greatest strength lies in its accessibility. Being entirely free to use removes the barrier of entry for individuals interested in exploring AI art generation without committing to subscription-based services. The app’s intuitive interface makes it easy for users with no prior experience to generate impressive images quickly. The variety of style presets provides a diverse range of creative directions, and the ability to adjust resolution offers some control over output quality. The sheer volume of installs (2,262,739) speaks to its appeal and effectiveness as a user-friendly entry point into AI art. Furthermore, the app’s responsiveness is generally good; prompt generation typically occurs within seconds, even on moderately powered devices.

Areas for Improvement

Despite its strengths, CreArt has notable areas requiring improvement:

  • Prompt Sensitivity: The AI's interpretation of prompts can sometimes be inconsistent. Vague or ambiguous prompts often lead to unpredictable results. More robust prompt engineering guidance would significantly enhance usability.
  • Seed Control Limitations: The seed control is extremely basic and offers limited influence over the final image. Expanding this feature with more granular parameters would dramatically improve creative control.
  • Image Quality at Higher Resolutions: While resolution options exist, generating images at higher resolutions can result in noticeable processing delays and occasionally compromises visual quality – particularly when complex prompts are used.
  • Lack of Advanced Features: Compared to dedicated AI art generators like Midjourney or DALL-E 2, CreArt lacks advanced features such as negative prompting (specifying what not to include in the image) or iterative refinement capabilities.

User Experience

The user experience within CreArt is remarkably simple and clean. The interface is uncluttered, with a prominent text input field for prompt creation and clearly labeled buttons for style selection and resolution adjustment. The flow of generating images is seamless—users simply type their prompt, select a style (optional), choose a resolution, and tap “Generate.” The app’s responsiveness contributes to a positive user experience. However, the lack of tutorials or guided prompts makes it challenging for new users to fully grasp the potential of the AI generator, particularly when crafting effective prompts.

Value for Money

As a completely free application, CreArt offers exceptional value for money. It provides access to a powerful AI image generation tool without any financial commitment. While professional artists might find limitations in its capabilities compared to paid alternatives, it’s an excellent option for beginners and casual users looking to experiment with AI art creation. The absence of ads or premium features further enhances the value proposition.

Conclusion

CreArt represents a solid entry-level AI image generator suitable for individuals new to the field of AI art. Its ease of use, free access, and diverse style presets make it an attractive option for those seeking creative exploration without significant investment. While limitations exist in terms of prompt sensitivity, seed control, and advanced features, CreArt effectively fulfills its core purpose: transforming text into visually engaging images. The app's high install count is a testament to its usability and potential. Future updates incorporating improved prompt handling and expanded feature sets would undoubtedly elevate CreArt to the level of more sophisticated AI art generators. For beginners and casual users, CreArt provides an accessible and enjoyable introduction to the exciting world of AI-generated art.
